title: Be Glad Continually | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Be Glad Continually | Joel Osteen
description:
If we want to keep our joy in life, we have to be intentional about the thoughts we meditate on. Make up your mind to start every day prepared for victory. God has the strength you need to overcome every obstacle.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
